### Apple Store in Manhattan, New York
Created on December 13, 2018

```{r}
library(leaflet)

apple <- data.frame(
    name = c('Apple World Trade Center', 'Apple West 14th Street', 
             'Apple SoHo', 'Apple Grand Central', 'Apple Fifth Avenue',
             'Apple Upper West Side', 'Apple Upper East Side'),
    lat = c(40.711915, 40.74127, 40.725058, 40.752658, 40.763538, 40.775005, 40.773357),
    lng = c(-74.011503, -74.005389, -73.999029, -73.976857, -73.9728, -73.982507, -73.964537))

apple %>% leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% 
    addMarkers(lat = apple$lat, lng = apple$lng, popup = apple$name, clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())

```
